mapper.update: update db_expstore set GROUPID = #{groupid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CUSTOMERID = #{customerid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPER = #{oper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPERTIME = #{opertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CORPID = #{corpid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPENFLAG = #{openflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATEFLAG = #{updateflag,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CONTENT = #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where SEQUENCEID = #{sequenceid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select: select SEQUENCEID, GROUPID, CUSTOMERID, OPER, OPERTIME, CORPID, OPENFLAG, UPDATEFLAG, CONTENT from db_expstore where SEQUENCEID = #{sequenceid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
select SEQUENCEID, GROUPID, CUSTOMERID, OPER, OPERTIME, CORPID, OPENFLAG, UPDATEFLAG, CONTENT from db_expstore
